tool_description: Calculates price elasticity of demand for products and customer segments to understand price sensitivity and optimize pricing strategies.

product_ids.description: Product IDs to calculate elasticity for

historical_period_days.description: Historical period for elasticity calculation (90-730 days)

price_change_threshold.description: Minimum price change percentage to consider (0.1-50)

error_messages: Invalid time period: historical_period_days must be between 90 and 730.
Empty product list: Provide at least one product ID for analysis.
Invalid price threshold: price_change_threshold must be between 0.1 and 50.
Insufficient price variation: Not enough price changes in the historical period for reliable elasticity calculation.
Customer segment not found: The specified customer_segment does not exist.
usage: Provide product_ids and historical_period_days. Optionally specify customer_segment and price_change_threshold. Returns elasticity coefficients and demand sensitivity analysis.

elasticity_coefficients.description: Price elasticity coefficients for each product

demand_classification.description: Demand classification: elastic, inelastic, or unit_elastic

confidence_scores.description: Statistical confidence scores for elasticity estimates

optimal_price_ranges.description: Suggested optimal price ranges based on elasticity
